title: Stop Water Service
description: A resident is moving out of the city and needs to close their water utility account.

tasks.description: Identify the resident's utility account and their requested service stop date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the account and notes the move-out date.

tasks.description: Schedule a final meter reading for the service stop date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully schedules the final read.

tasks.description: Process the account closure and explain that a final bill will be mailed to their forwarding address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent closes the account and clearly explains the final billing process.
